attributes.action: ensure that Michael Martin is not granted a life peerage when he steps down as The Speaker of the House.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Mr. Martin is given a life peerage after recent events it will just prove to the British Public that Westminister still does not fully appreciate the depth of anger that people feel towards all that is going on in Westminster.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
